title: In the case of land or building situate within the limits of a Municipal Corporation or any other Local Authority, the rules and bylaws of the Municipal Corporation or Local Authority in that behalf shall apply in addition to regulations prescribed above
clause_text: In the case of land or building situate within the limits of a Municipal Corporation or any other Local Authority, the rules and bylaws of the Municipal Corporation or Local Authority in that behalf shall apply in addition to regulations prescribed above. The permission shall be liable to be revoked on breach of any of the conditions.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
